nodes.text: The XS-800 light freighter was designed and introduced several years before the Battle of Yavin.

The biggest advantage of this ship was the passengers' comfort. Personal refresher stations, independent climate control for each quarters, and fold-out bunks made it a very comfortable ship for long journeys.

Two escape pods capable of each seating five people were equipped on the XS-800. Also, the cockpit was designed to separate from the ship and land on a planet when there was no other way to rescue passengers and crew. Safety was also guaranteed by its double laser cannon.
It was a very successful craft, but not as popular as other Corellian Engineering Corporation ships, like the CR90 corvette.
